Pretty much everything about this game is amazing. The game is very lighthearted with tons of jokes. But at the same time the game can be very creepy the more you learn about Aperture Science. Even though the main character Chell isn't very interesting since she's another silent protaganist, the others like Wheatley and GLaDOS are great. GLaDOS may be the villain, but her sarcasm, sense of humour and her wit is very likeable. And Wheatley is your dumb and charming companion that helps you on your way. The gameplay is also very entertaining, some puzzles may be hard but it feels so good once you beat them. Unless you looked up a guide that is. Also, for a game that came out in 2011, the graphics still look really good. The endgame is also brilliant, very memorable.
The soundtrack is awesome.
The voiceacting is awesome.
The story is awesome.
Yeah, pretty much everything is great.
So final conclusion:
